company_data.name: InnovateTech
company_data.mission: To innovate and deliver cutting-edge tech solutions.

story.title: Expanding to the Asian Market
story.background: InnovateTech has seen steady growth in North America and Europe but has struggled to penetrate the Asian market.
story.challenge: The company needs to develop a robust entry strategy to capture market share in Asia within the next two years.

scenario.current_situation: Competitors are already well-established in the Asian market, leveraging local partnerships and tailored solutions.
objectives: Adapt product offerings to meet regional preferences
Create a marketing strategy to build brand awareness
constraints: Budget limited to $10 million for the first year
Regulatory compliance requirements in different countries
